resources.string: Enter tags, separated by a space
To create a new note, tap the plus at the bottom of the main window. \nTo edit a note, tap the note in the main window

Changing Launcher Icon:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/26615889/how-to-change-the-launcher-logo-of-an-app-in-android-studio

Icon Template for Sketch 3:
http://www.sketchappsources.com/resource/download-477.html

Removing View Programmatically:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3805599/add-delete-view-from-layout

Handling Images in SQLite:
http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/995286/Saving-an-image-in-a-SQLite-database-in-your-Andro
Adding an image to a note. The app saves the image locally with a path in the Database.
The image icons in lists of notes don\'t show for the first item in the list.
